metadata.creator: Zerofuturism
metadata.description:
Artworks by @jaredpike
Music by @zerofuturism
Guest artist @yunfpuff

Jaredpike: https://www.instagram.com/jaredpike.art
https://www.youtube.com/c/JaredPike
https://twitter.com/jaredpike

Yunfpuff:
https://twitter.com/yunfpuff
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTtE...

Zerofuturism:
https://twitter.com/zerofuturism
https://zerofuturism.bandcamp.com/
https://instagram.com/zerofuturism

If you want to buy me a coffe/Download Tracks: https://zerofuturism.bandcamp.com/
